meanings.definition: The quality or state of being schistose.
meanings.sent1: The schistosity of the rock made it easy to split into thin layers.
meanings.sent2: Geologists study the schistosity of rocks to understand their formation.
meanings.sent3: The schistosity of the mountain was so pronounced that it looked like layers of paper stacked on top of each other.
meanings.sent4: The schistosity of the landscape revealed the history of the earth's crust.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering schistosity of the rock caught the sunlight, creating a beautiful display.

meanings.definition: The arrangement of minerals in layers within a rock.
meanings.sent1: The schistosity of the granite showed distinct bands of different minerals.
meanings.sent2: Miners examined the schistosity of the ore to determine its value.
meanings.sent3: The schistosity of the cave walls made it look like a natural work of art.
meanings.sent4: The schistosity of the rock formation resembled a colorful layered cake.
meanings.sent5: The unique schistosity of the sedimentary rock made it a popular attraction for geology enthusiasts.
